thread.section_title: Reservation Counter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reservation Counter | reservationcounter.com
thread.title: Clayton Lloyd
thread.title_full: Reservation Counter reviewed by Clayton Lloyd

author: Clayton Lloyd
title: Clayton Lloyd
text: Wanted to secure reservation for hotel close to airport and, if possible, the same as where we stayed in two years ago. Did not recall the name but was able to find building on aerial photo on laptop mapping system. This allowed me to access name and connect to Best Western reservation system. Easy to go through steps and secured reservation for competitive price. Success!
